description: CD Genomics provides CRISPR-Cas9 knockout validation and potential off-target detection in a high-throughput and cost-effective manner by harnessing advanced next generation sequencing (NGS). Our team members have experience in both genome editing and NGS, enabling extensive support to your research. CD Genomics is able to help you to detect the potential off-target effects via targets enrichment and deep sequencing at fairly inexpensive prices.
name: NGS for CRISPR knockout validation
